name: Hexgame
description:
This is a copy of the hexagonal word game commonly found in newspapers, (among them the New York Times Spelling Bee). You must guess words that:

  • Include the central letter,
  • Are least four letters long,
  • Do not include any letters beyond the seven given letters.

You get one point for a four letter word and many more points for longer words. You also get bonus points if you get a pangram, that is you use every available letter.

The letters reset daily, so feel free to come back tomorrow to a new set of letters with a new pangram to guess!

---

The source for this game is available on GitHub.
